attributes.action: stand down and hold a general election now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now the British government has given away even more rights to the EU without upholding their manifesto pledge of allowing the people a referendum, I demand that the current serving government should stand down and hold a general election immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
